channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Oklahoma death row inmate had three 'last meals.' He's back at Supreme Court in new bid for freedom
Doctor admits disguising as nurse in attempt to kill man with poison
item.description: Prosecutors said Thomas Kwan used his "encyclopedic knowledge" of poisons in his plot to kill Patrick O'Hara.

item.title: White House press secretary Karine Jean-Pierre promoted to senior adviser: Exclusive
item.description: White House press secretary Karine Jean-Pierre has been promoted to Senior Adviser to the President, ABC News has learned.

item.title: Author Jason Reynolds tackles romance writing in new book
item.description: Jason Reynolds has written more than a dozen books for young readers on difficult topics. Now, he enters the world of young adult romance with "Twenty...

item.title: This Is Why You Wear Your Seatbelt, Kids
Entrepreneur shares a taste of her homeland with empanadas biz
Patriots captain Jabrill Peppers arrested on assault, strangulation, drug charges
item.description: Police say Patriots captain Jabrill Peppers was arrested over the weekend on assault, strangulation and other charges following a disturbance at a hom...

item.title: Kathy Bates shocked to learn she did thank her mother in her Oscar speech
item.description: Academy Award-winner Kathy Bates was certain she had neglected to mention her mom when she accepted the Oscar for "Misery" 33 years ago – until "Sunda...

item.title: Supreme Court rejects Republican-led challenge to ease voter registration
Supreme Court lets stand a decision barring emergency abortions that violate Texas ban
Water supplier American Water Works says systems hacked
item.description: American Water Works says it's investigating impact of breach; utility supplies drinking water to 14 million people.

item.title: Nobel Prize in medicine honors two Americans for discovery of microRNA
item.description: The Nobel Assembly said that the discovery is “fundamentally important.”

item.title: Israel-Gaza-Lebanon live updates: Hamas, Hezbollah fire rockets on Oct. 7 anniversary
item.description: Israel is marking the Oct. 7 attack anniversary amid its intense airstrike campaign across Lebanon, which includes continued airstrikes in Beirut.

item.title: AI-generated video purportedly showing fiery Beirut skyline goes viral
item.description: A video montage posted to X showed massive fires on the Beirut skyline — but the most dramatic scene was made by artificial intelligence.

item.title: Hurricane Milton tracker and forecast: Record-breaking storm surge expected
item.description: Hurricane Milton strengthened on Monday morning into a Category 4 storm, with wind speeds climbing over 100 mph.
